entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is the one who is tightening her face and speaking in a dangerous voice. She is also the one who is forcing Harry Potter to tell her something.

entities.name: potter
entities.description: Potter is the one who refused Umbridge's offer to tell her something freely.

entities.name: draco
entities.description: Draco is the one who is asked by Umbridge to fetch Professor Snape.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a member of the Order of the Phoenix and is still at Hogwarts. Harry realizes that he can count on Snape for help.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is struggling against Warrington's half nelson and his lip is bleeding onto Umbridge's carpet.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is still trying to keep Ron under control.

relationships.description: Umbridge forces Potter to tell her something.
Draco is asked by Umbridge to fetch Professor Snape.
Potter realizes that he can count on the members of the Order of the Phoenix for help, and specifically mentions Snape as a member still at Hogwarts.
Snape is a member of the Order of the Phoenix.
